entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
